channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Handbags Sale
channel.desc: Bag yourself a bargain in our handbag sale, offering deals on an array of gorgeous bags from designer totes to essential cross-bodies. Whatever you're looking for, find it at a fabulous price here.
